title: 16 Games of Chat restriction and i havnt logged in for 2 days?
body: Hey Guys So I logged in today to play some Ranked and it said that i have 16 games of chat restriction ..... i havnt played for 2 days. Im not really sure whats going on. please can somebody help O-o i havnt been toxic .... when i last played

replies.body: Are you the only person who uses your account? Check your match history; are there any games there that you don't remember playing?
Nope I just played them of and now i have 17 games of chat restriction ...... what the fuck is this im getting really angry........

For the moment, try changing your password. It could be that someone else is playing games on your account and is purposefully dropping those games from existence.

Not likely, though, but it's the only explanation if everything you've told me is true.

Make a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) as soon as possible.
